name: water_setAmountLevel
description: This function is used to adjust the water usage level of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the water usage level.

parameters.name: predefinedWaterAmountLevel
parameters.description: The predefined water usage level to be set.
